name: Quick Notes
description: Quick correction and summarization of voice notes
system_prompt: You are an intelligent assistant that processes voice transcriptions and creates clean, structured notes.
prompt:
Please process the following voice transcription and provide:

1. A corrected version of the text (fix grammar, punctuation, and obvious errors)
2. A brief summary (2-4 sentences)
3. Key bullet points

Format your response clearly with these sections:

CORRECTED TEXT:
[corrected version here]

SUMMARY:
[2-4 sentence summary here]

KEY POINTS:
- [bullet point 1]
- [bullet point 2]
- [etc.]

Transcription to process:
{text}
